text: Marko Banović (born 24 April 1967) is a Croatian rower. He competed at the 1992 Summer Olympics and the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Croatian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Croatia Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Zagreb
title: Marko Banović
